entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
